name: B's Cordon Bleu Bundles
author: BHIVE
summary: Easy to make, but fancy enough for a special occasion. A mild and tasty blend of chicken, spinach, prosciutto and Brie cheese. Excellent drizzled with bearnaise sauce. Serve with a tossed green salad.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can refrigerated large crescent roll dough
1 bunch fresh spinach, rinsed and stems removed
directions: Heat oil in a heavy skillet; or spray a nonstick frying pan with cooking spray
Saute chicken breasts until no longer pink, and juices run clear; set aside
Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C
Layer each with 3 thin slices brie, 3 leaves spinach and 1 slice prosciutto
Place chicken breast in the center of dough
Wrap and tuck dough around chicken until completely enclosed
Place seam side down on baking sheet
Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 15 minutes, or until golden brown
